Posts.Content: pomcpom wrote: well I went to c my breast surgeon today...couldnt talk him out of getting the biopsy:(...i asked him if there was any additional criteria that could be added to my needing a breast biopsy since i have had 6 previous ones (that were all b9)...since he was really an expert at looking at a mammo or ultrasound report and being able to tell mostly what it was ...and he said that yes thats true in some cases but not all..and not mine...he said that his concerns with my lump was that it wasnt there 6 mths ago at my last mammo/ultra and that there were irregular borders on one side..which i might add the radiologist did not see i guess...his quote to me was "wat grows in 6 months?" i kicked myself in the car because i didnt ask wat DOES grow in 6 mths or culd something have been there and not detected...so I wait but I ask all of you can cancer grow in 6 mths...he wasnt as keen on the fibroadenoma after I told him i had a hysterectomy..hence no menstruation and they are mostly hormone induced BUT it still culd be one...so I wait..again...any ideas would be so helpful...of curse i had to have on a fri so now i have to wait till like tues or wed...i honestly was not concerned until after i saw him and saw some concern in his demeanor..anyhoo thank you:):) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: This is not again? pomcpom Cuetang

Posts.Content: pomcpom wrote: So i rcvd a copy of report and i states "likely represents a fibrodenoma" so maybe dr will not make me have biopsy...do u agree it would not be nec Log in to post a reply
